This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Check that animations missing 'from' keyframes are responsive to underlying style changes 
PASS Check that animations missing 'to' keyframes are responsive to underlying style changes 
PASS Check that animations missing both 'from' and 'to' keyframes are responsive to underlying style changes 
PASS Check that animations with neutral keyframes are responsive to font size changes 
PASS Check that composited animations with neutral keyframes are responsive to underlying style changes 
PASS Check that running animations with neutral keyframes are responsive to style changes 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
